Text: ATTENTION: THIS FLASH COMPONENT APPEARS TO BE EXPLOITING THE PRE-9 FLASH PLAYER VULNERABILITIES AND SENDS KEY STROKES THROUGH INTERNET. This is a already know vulnerability -you must upgrade to version 9 of flash player-. The Kaspersky Firewall warned me about a keylogger activity every time I was running the movie.
after 5min trying ;-) it seems to be o.k. ;o) i have norton internet security and no virus was detected... iÂ´m using latest flash player 9...
